text:
="preserve">Ennio Zanini is italian eurobeat singer. Born in Desenzano del Garda, Brescia in Italy on September 16th, 1964. He plays the guitar and the keyboard
He uses the stage names of Fastway or Dusty. He uses Tanith for his eurobeat act. In italy, he plays with the punk rock band monopolice. He worked with Christian Codenotti (ACE) belong the name Go2
